Name: Pegasus
SpecRules: Drone Repair: The Regenerate rule does not shut down when this ship is Crippled

Name: Ourania
SpecRules: Targeting Link: Friendly ships within range (Scan + Signature) of this ship can use it as a "spotter". Measure range from the spotter to the target ship instead of from the firing ship. The firing ship must however still be able to draw line of sight to the target ship. This rule does not have any effect on Close Action weapons.

Weapons.Name: XN-31 Mass Driver Turret Pair
Weapons.FullString: XN-31 Mass Driver Turret Pair F/S

Name: Remus
SpecRules: The Remus is Limited to 4 Torpedoes total, and may fire all of them in one round.

Name: Calypso
SpecRules: Once per turn, after an enemy group has allocated Attack Dice, you may pick a friendly ship within 4‚Äù of the Calypso. Add 1 to the lock value of the groups Attack Dice allocated to this ship. Subsequent attacks by other groups are not affected. In order to be affected, ships must be on the same orbital layer as the Calypso, in addition the calypso can choose to target itself. This is cumulative with other Advanced ECM Suites. This rule may not be used against Launch Assets nor weapons with the close action special rule

Name: Medea
SpecRules: Low Level: This weapon may be fired from atmosphere with no penalties to it's lock value.

Name: Pungari Thresher
SpecRules: Pungari Bulk Landers only drop Infantry Assets.

Name: Harpocrates
SpecRules: EM Sabotage: If this weapon hits, the target ship gets put on Silent Running orders until the end of its next activation.

Name: Agrippa
SpecRules: Holo-Debris Field: Change Holo-Debris Field effect to: Once per activation (during any part of the activation, including during movement) you may place a Dense Debris Field within 3‚Äù of this ship. These debris fields are removed at the end of the Roundup phase and are circular with a 4‚Äù diameter (a D6 or custom template are perfect tokens to represent these). Friendly ships and Launch Assets ignore these Debris Fields.
